scripts.prime-cache:prod: cross-env PORT=4001 bunx start-server-and-test start http-get://localhost:4001 curl:blog && echo cache primed ⚡️
scripts.prime-cache:mocks: cross-env PORT=4001 bunx start-server-and-test start:mocks http-get://localhost:4001 curl:blog && echo cache primed ⚡️
scripts.setup: bun install && bunx prisma@7 migrate reset --force && bun run validate && bun run prime-cache:mocks && bun run test:e2e:install && bun run test:e2e:run
